segment.source: You can run Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5 in a Stand-alone topology or in a Configuration Manager Integration topology that integrates MBAM with System Center Configuration Manager.
segment.target: You can run Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5 in a Stand-alone topology or in a Configuration Manager Integration topology that integrates MBAM with System Center Configuration Manager.

segment.source: If you use the recommended configuration for either topology in a production environment, MBAM supports up to 500,000 MBAM clients.
segment.target: If you use the recommended configuration for either topology in a production environment, MBAM supports up to 500,000 MBAM clients.

segment.source: For information about the recommended architecture and features that are configured on each server for each topology, see High-Level Architecture for MBAM 2.5.
segment.target: For information about the recommended architecture and features that are configured on each server for each topology, see High-Level Architecture for MBAM 2.5.

segment.source: For additional configurations that are specific to the Configuration Manager Integration topology, see Versions of Configuration Manager that MBAM supports.
segment.target: For additional configurations that are specific to the Configuration Manager Integration topology, see Versions of Configuration Manager that MBAM supports.

segment.source: Microsoft provides support for the current service pack and, in some cases, the immediately preceding service pack.
segment.target: Microsoft provides support for the current service pack and, in some cases, the immediately preceding service pack.

segment.source: To find the support timelines for your product, see the Lifecycle Supported Service Packs.
segment.target: To find the support timelines for your product, see the Lifecycle Supported Service Packs.

segment.source: For additional information about Microsoft Support Lifecycle Policy, see Microsoft Support Lifecycle Support Policy FAQ.
segment.target: For additional information about Microsoft Support Lifecycle Policy, see Microsoft Support Lifecycle Support Policy FAQ.

segment.source: The following tables show the languages that are supported for the MBAM Client (including the Self-Service Portal) and the MBAM Server in MBAM 2.5 and MBAM 2.5 SP1.
segment.target: The following tables show the languages that are supported for the MBAM Client (including the Self-Service Portal) and the MBAM Server in MBAM 2.5 and MBAM 2.5 SP1.

segment.source: The following table lists the operating systems that are supported for the MBAM Server installation.
segment.target: The following table lists the operating systems that are supported for the MBAM Server installation.

segment.source: The enterprise domain must contain at least one Windows Server 2008 (or later) domain controller.
segment.target: The enterprise domain must contain at least one Windows Server 2008 (or later) domain controller.

segment.source: MBAM Server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements – Stand-alone topology
segment.target: MBAM Server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements – Stand-alone topology

segment.source: These requirements are for the MBAM Stand-alone topology.
segment.target: These requirements are for the MBAM Stand-alone topology.

segment.source: For the requirements for the Configuration Manager Integration topology, see MBAM Server Processor, RAM, and Disk Space Requirements - Configuration Manager Integration Topology.
segment.target: For the requirements for the Configuration Manager Integration topology, see MBAM Server Processor, RAM, and Disk Space Requirements - Configuration Manager Integration Topology.

segment.source: MBAM Server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements - Configuration Manager Integration topology
segment.target: MBAM Server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements - Configuration Manager Integration topology

segment.source: The following table lists the server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements for MBAM servers when you are using the Configuration Manager Integration topology.
segment.target: The following table lists the server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements for MBAM servers when you are using the Configuration Manager Integration topology.

segment.source: For the requirements for the Stand-alone topology, see MBAM Server Processor, RAM, and Disk Space Requirements – Stand-alone Topology.
segment.target: For the requirements for the Stand-alone topology, see MBAM Server Processor, RAM, and Disk Space Requirements – Stand-alone Topology.

segment.source: Versions of Configuration Manager that MBAM supports
segment.target: Versions of Configuration Manager that MBAM supports

segment.source: MBAM supports the following versions of Configuration Manager.
segment.target: MBAM supports the following versions of Configuration Manager.

segment.source: Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager
segment.target: Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager

segment.source: Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager 2007 R2 or later
segment.target: Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager 2007 R2 or later

segment.source: Although Configuration Manager 2007 R2 is 32 bit, you must install it and SQL Server on a 64-bit operating system in order to match the 64-bit MBAM software.
segment.target: Although Configuration Manager 2007 R2 is 32 bit, you must install it and SQL Server on a 64-bit operating system in order to match the 64-bit MBAM software.

segment.source: For a list of supported configurations for the Configuration Manager Server, see the appropriate TechNet documentation for the version of Configuration Manager that you are using.
segment.target: For a list of supported configurations for the Configuration Manager Server, see the appropriate TechNet documentation for the version of Configuration Manager that you are using.

segment.source: MBAM has no additional system requirements for the Configuration Manager Server.
segment.target: MBAM has no additional system requirements for the Configuration Manager Server.

segment.source: The following table lists the Microsoft SQL Server versions that are supported for the MBAM Server features, which include the Recovery Database, Compliance and Audit Database, and the Reports feature.
segment.target: The following table lists the Microsoft SQL Server versions that are supported for the MBAM Server features, which include the Recovery Database, Compliance and Audit Database, and the Reports feature.

segment.source: The required versions apply to the Stand-alone or the Configuration Manager Integration topologies.
segment.target: The required versions apply to the Stand-alone or the Configuration Manager Integration topologies.

segment.source: You must install SQL Server with the SQLLatin1GeneralCP1CIAS collation.
segment.target: You must install SQL Server with the SQLLatin1GeneralCP1CIAS collation.

segment.source: SQL Server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements – Stand-alone topology
segment.target: SQL Server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements – Stand-alone topology

segment.source: The following table lists the recommended server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements for the SQL Server computer when you are using the Stand-alone topology.
segment.target: The following table lists the recommended server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements for the SQL Server computer when you are using the Stand-alone topology.

segment.source: Use these requirements as a guide.
segment.target: Use these requirements as a guide.

segment.source: Your specific requirements will vary based on the number of client computers you are supporting in your enterprise.
segment.target: Your specific requirements will vary based on the number of client computers you are supporting in your enterprise.

segment.source: To view the requirements for the Configuration Manager Integration topology, see SQL Server Processor, RAM, and Disk Space Requirements - Configuration Manager Integration Topology.
segment.target: To view the requirements for the Configuration Manager Integration topology, see SQL Server Processor, RAM, and Disk Space Requirements - Configuration Manager Integration Topology.

segment.source: SQL Server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements - Configuration Manager Integration topology
segment.target: SQL Server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements - Configuration Manager Integration topology

segment.target: The following table lists the server processor, RAM, and disk space requirements for the Microsoft SQL Server computer when you are using the Configuration Manager Integration topology, see SQL Server Processor, RAM, and Disk Space Requirements – Stand-alone Topology.

segment.target: The following table lists the operating systems that are supported for MBAM Client installation.

segment.source: The same requirements apply to the Stand-alone and the Configuration Manager Integration topologies.
segment.target: The same requirements apply to the Stand-alone and the Configuration Manager Integration topologies.

segment.source: There are no RAM requirements that are specific to the MBAM Client installation.
segment.target: There are no RAM requirements that are specific to the MBAM Client installation.
